Text: Such A Sailing Dealagain Because of all the positive response I called the Windjammer Barefoot Cruise group department and negotiated a savings for two different cruises LEGACY October November cruise Aruba Bonaire Curacao Venezuela Aruba Ensign Cabins bunks Reg our cruise Commodore Double Bed Reg our cruise Port charges NO CHARGE FOR THE STOWAWAY Fare Share will apply It is from PDX will be less for those of you to the East Once you have made a deposit I can get the Fare Share rate from your airport WJ is in the process of negotiating with hotels in Aruba I will not be doing group hotel arrangements I will share info about hotels and those who want to stay over can do their own POLYNESIA November Repositioning Cruise For those wanting to do a Back to Back From St Lucia to St Maarten Theme Cruise Sea of Wellness with Massage Therapists Yoga etc Deck Cabins Reg our cruise Standard Cabins Reg our cruise BQ Reg our cruise Port Charges THE CATCH WJ group department will only deal with one person so all payments and questions have topass through me If we dont get people the rate reverts to the regular rate So enlist your funnestbuddies to come along too HOW TO GET IN ON THE DEAL Decide which weeks you want to sail Send a deposit for each cruise and additional if you plan to use Fare Share Checks can be made out to WJ or to me and sentto me at PO BOX Newport Oregon You can use your credit card Send me the and expiration date or you can give it to me on the phone My number is IF you want to use Fare Share let me know which days you want to arrive and depart and from which airport Simple as Looking forward to seeing you Gail

The Group to Aruba is a GO We already have people confirmed for the Aruba cruise and lots who have expressed interest in going the group discount is a given So if you want to join us on the Oct Nov cruise on the Legacy be sure and let me know while we still have group space For those of you who have paid your deposit they are already turned in to Windjammer and your cabins are secure Those of you who have told me that you wont be able to join us I hope you dont mind that I included you in this post If you have any friends who might want to join us youll have the information CANCELLATION POLICY You can get a full refund of all moneys paid up until July From July Aug if you cancel you pay a penalty and are given cruise credit for the remaining to be used in the next two years After Aug there is no refund You can sell your space to someone else though Total payment is due August TO CONFIRM SPACE EMail me at or Phone me at with your credit card number or Send a check to PO Box Newport Oregon The deposit for the cruise is If you want Fare Share it is an additional Let me know the following What type of cabin do you want Commodore Doubles have full sized beds and are Standards havebunks and are Do you want Fare Share From which airport and which day do you want to arrive in Aruba and depart from Aruba Here are some samples of Fare Share Rates round trip to Aruba PDX GSO LEX SDF PHL CVG SYR If you arrive on Sunday and leave on Saturday or if Windjammer books two nights in a hotel for you there is no deviation fee But if you only stay one night or deviate otherwise there is a deviation fee Do you want trip insurance It is Well be waysouth of the hurricane belt but you have to fly over it to get to Aruba I highly recommend trip insurance Do you want me to make a hotel reservation for you with the group Windjammers Hotel Dept is still negotiating with one hotel in Aruba and it sounds like well get a much better rate as a group than trying to book individually So in contrast to what I said earlier if you want a hotel room let me know which night to book for you Right now there is no need to send a deposit for the hotel If you choose to stay elsewhere once you find out where they put us that is fine POLY REPO CRUISE The Poly repo cruise is Nov through November from St Lucia to St Maarten She will be coming out of dry dock with a whole new top deck and a reconfigured bar area We only have confirmed so far on the Poly but quite a few are interested and we still have plenty of time yet to find more passengers Deck cabins are Standard Cabins are and the BQ is Fare Share rates are the same as to Aruba but they have an additional fee because you fly into St Lucia and out of St Maarten The bad news for those who want to do both weeks is that there are no direct flights from Aruba to St Lucia and you have to go through San Juan to get there The fare for that leg is close to The good news for those who want to do both weeks and have Aadvantage Frequent Flyer miles is that you can fly from your home to Aruba then up to St Lucia and then home from St Maarten all for miles and Hope to see a whole bunch of you next Fall Gail
